topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5456cc366368724306710100#post_5456cc366368724306710100
Pretty much; I've known people like that before where they make one amazing thing and then they can't live up to everyone's expectations anymore so they rely on that one amazing thing to continue to get attention from people.


Also I'm sort of getting back into being a fan of vocaloids; I can't stand 95% of the songs cause most of the people making them don't know what the fuck they're doing and the songs sound like garbage, but the 5% that actually know what they're doing actually do make it sound good.  I'm pretty much waiting five seconds in to hear the voices and it's apparent off the bat which is good and which is bad.
